```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
SoilTemp <- read_excel("data/SoilTemp.xlsx") |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = Obs:DNDC, names_to = "Model", values_to = "Temp")

Truro <- SoilTemp |> filter(Site != "Montreal")

Montreal <- SoilTemp |> filter(Site == "Montreal")
```

# Montreal
```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_line(data = Montreal |> filter(Model == "DNDC"), mapping = aes(Date, Temp), geom = "line", col = "red") +
  geom_point(data = Montreal |> filter(Model == "Obs"), mapping = aes(Date, Temp), geom = "point") +
  facet_wrap(~Year, scales = "free") + theme_base()
```

# Truro
```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_line(data = Truro |> filter(Model == "DNDC"), mapping = aes(Date, Temp), geom = "line", col = "red") +
  geom_point(data = Truro |> filter(Model == "Obs"), mapping = aes(Date, Temp), geom = "point") +
  facet_wrap(~Year, scales = "free") +
  theme_base()
```
